subject: Steroids
Baseball
Television
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: The Congressional testimony of Mark McGwire, Sammy Sosa and Rafael Palmeiro, broadcast on national television, was the steroids trial that has not occurred in baseball.
snippet: The Congressional testimony of Mark McGwire, Sammy Sosa and Rafael Palmeiro, broadcast on national television, was the steroids trial that has not occurred in baseball.
